SELECT IPAddress AS "IPAddress" , OS AS "OS" , Browser AS "Browser" , TO_CHAR(LogonDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "LogonDate" , TO_CHAR(LogoutDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "LogoutDate" FROM log_connect WHERE LogonID = #{userCode}
AND LogonDate >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND LogonDate <= TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
IPAddress OS Browser LogoutDate LogonDate
ASC DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER U LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP UB ON U.USERCODE = UB.USERCODE AND UB.JOBTYPE = 'Origin' WHERE IsUse = 'Y'
AND UB.COMPANYCODE = #{domainCode}

SELECT SL.LicSeq "LicSeq" , SL.LicName "LicName" , SL.LicModule "LicModule" , SL.IsOpt "IsOpt" , (SELECT NVL(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName), DisplayName) FROM portal WHERE PortalID = SL.InitPortal) AS "PortalName" , (SELECT NVL(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName), DisplayName) FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = SL.RegisterCode) AS "RegisterName" , NVL(SL.ModifyDate, SL.RegistDate) AS "ModifyDate" , SL.Description "Description" FROM sys_license SL WHERE SL.IsUse = 'Y'
LicName ModuleName IsOpt PortalName RegisterName ModifyDate
ASC DESC
/* queryID = license.manage.selectLicenseManageListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(SL.LicSeq) AS "cnt" FROM sys_license SL WHERE 1=1 AND SL.IsUse = 'Y'

/* queryId : license.manage.selectLicenseManageInfo */ SELECT SL.LicSeq "LicSeq" , SL.LicName "LicName" , SL.LicModule "LicModule" , SL.IsOpt "IsOpt" , SL.InitPortal AS "PortalID" , (SELECT NVL(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName), DisplayName) FROM sys_object_user WHERE UserCode = SL.RegisterCode) AS "RegisterName" , NVL(SL.ModifyDate, SL.RegistDate) AS "ModifyDate" , SL.Description "Description" , NVL(SL.IsMbPortal, 'N') AS "IsMbPortal" FROM sys_license SL WHERE SL.LicSeq = #{licSeq}

/* queryID : license.manage.selectLicensePortal */ SELECT PO.PortalID AS "PortalID" , CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , NVL(Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, PO.MultiDisplayName), DisplayName) AS "DisplayName" FROM portal PO WHERE 1=1 AND PO.IsUse = 'Y' AND po.PortalType='License' ORDER BY SortKey
